mapper.sql: zm_student.student_id, zm_student.stu_no, zm_student.name, zm_student.gender, zm_student.age, zm_student.birthday, zm_student.phone, zm_student.address, zm_student.admission_date, zm_student.state, zm_student.is_delete, zm_student.create_time, zm_student.update_time, zm_student.op_user_id, zm_student.op_user_name, zm_student.op_role_name
mapper.select: select , cla.class_id,cla.name as class_name from zm_student left join zm_class_relation_student stuRela on zm_student.student_id = stuRela.student_id left join zm_class cla on cla.class_id = stuRela.class_id where zm_student.student_id = #{studentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.delete: update zm_student set is_delete = 1 where student_id = #{studentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into zm_student (student_id, stu_no, name, gender, age, birthday, phone, address, admission_date, state, is_delete, create_time, update_time, op_user_id, op_user_name, op_role_name) values (#{studentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{stuNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{admissionDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{opUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{opUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opRoleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update zm_student
stu_no = #{stuNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gender = #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER},
birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
admission_date = #{admissionDate,jdbcType=DATE},
state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
op_user_id = #{opUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
op_user_name = #{opUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
op_role_name = #{opRoleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where student_id = #{studentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update zm_student set stu_no = #{stuNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gender = #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, admission_date = #{admissionDate,jdbcType=DATE}, state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, op_user_id = #{opUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, op_user_name = #{opUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, op_role_name = #{opRoleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where student_id = #{studentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select ,cla.class_id,cla.name as class_name from zm_student left join zm_class_relation_student stuRela on zm_student.student_id = stuRela.student_id left join zm_class cla on cla.class_id = stuRela.class_id
and zm_student.is_delete = 0
and zm_student.stu_no like CONCAT('%',#{stuNo},'%')
and zm_student.name like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
and gender = #{gender}
and phone like CONCAT('%',#{phone},'%')
and state = #{state}
and class_name like CONCAT('%',#{className},'%')
order by update_time desc

select
from zm_student where is_delete = 0 and state = 0

select
from zm_student where is_delete = 0 and state = 0 and stu_no =#{stuNo} and phone =#{phone}
